title: Factors affecting detection and estimation of SARS-CoV-2 RNA concentration of COVID-19 positive cases in wastewater influent: A systematic review
content:
Publication date: December 2024

Source: Public Health, Volume 237

Author(s): Funanani Mashau, Ayokunle C. Dada, Luyanda Msolo, Kingsley E. Ebomah, Temitope C. Ekundayo, Chidozie D. Iwu, Nolonwabo Nontongana, Anthony I. Okoh
